description: Mathematical solver software capable of solving large mixed-integer linear sets of equations to support CER’s Energy Information program
duration_in_months: [Implementation: 6 months, Ongoing: 57 months] for a total of 63
full_summary:
**84840-230002 Cloud-based Mathematical Solver Software Request for Proposal**
===========================================================

**Reference Number:** WS4128590529-Doc4129099981
**Publication Date:** August 2nd, 2023
**Closing Date:** September 26, 2023, 2 PM EST

**Overview**
---------------

The Canada Energy Regulator (CER) is seeking a cloud-based mathematical solver software capable of solving large mixed-integer linear sets of equations to support CER's Energy Information program. The software must be capable of delivering high-performance results and provide end users with advanced analytical capabilities.

**Contract Period**
-----------------

The contract is for a duration of 5 years.

**Bid Submission Requirements**
------------------------------

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by September 26, 2023, at 2 PM EST. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

**Software Requirements**
-------------------------

The mathematical solver software must meet the following requirements:

* Be cloud-based
* Be capable of solving large mixed-integer linear sets of equations
* Provide high-performance results
* Offer advanced analytical capabilities

**Delivery Point**
------------------

All software delivery must be made to Canada Energy Regulator, 517 Tenth Ave SW, Calgary, AB T2R 0A8.

**Procurement Method**
----------------------

This procurement is being conducted using a Competitive - Open bidding method.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contact Information**
-------------------------

For any questions or clarifications, please contact:

* Unser, Shelley
* Email: <shelley.unser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
* Phone: (Not Provided)
* Fax: (Not Provided)

**Bidder Inquiries**
----------------------

All inquiries must be submitted in writing via email to the above contact information.

**Request for Proposal**
-------------------------

Interested vendors must submit their proposals via [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17054691?extsite=MTcwNTQ2OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) not later than September 26, 2023, at 2 PM EST.
